attributes.action: STOP the two child limit immediately
attributes.additional_details: This is ridiculous as a single parent I have to go out and work and I have 2 kids under 3 ! I have no partner because the government removed him from the country so it’s a struggle I am pregnant and I will struggle I don’t want to go to work when my baby is a new born PLEASE PLEASE HELP and stop further poverty for out children
attributes.background: The Universal Credit introduces a 2 child element limit after April 2017 so if you have a 3 rd child after this date you won’t get any benefits o my if your exempt e.g a child was conceived during rap or coerced into it.
